description: A nighttime scene in the empty Yichang Museum. The Sun Man Stone Statue wears New Stone Age attire and sunglasses, dancing with hip-hop style. The environment is softly lit, with spotlights and other artifacts playfully animated.
music_effect: 宜昌当地特色乐器共同演奏出匹配rap的底乐，比如宜昌丝竹、锣鼓艺术等。
narration: 哟哟哟，听起 我是太阳人石刻超有脾气 穿越悠悠岁月带着底气 西南文化里头我是硬货等级
speaker: 太阳人

description: The Sun Man notices a cute little character clapping. He walks over and curiously asks who it is.
narration: 你是谁？我活了七千多年了，怎么从来没见过你？
speaker: 太阳人

description: Bo Xiaoyi smiles sweetly and introduces itself politely to the Sun Man.
narration: 您好，太阳人前辈，我叫博小翼，是今天新来的。
speaker: 博小翼

description: The Sun Man looks at Bo Xiaoyi's futuristic appearance with curiosity, surprised that such a trendy item is in the museum.
narration: 你认得我？博小翼？看起来也不像鸟啊？这么潮流的现代产物也能进博物馆了？
speaker: 太阳人

description: Bo Xiaoyi explains that it is not an artifact, but an AI-based digital tour guide that supports multimodal interaction—text, voice, and image. It demonstrates how to interact via mobile phone.
narration: 您误会了，我不是鸟，也不是展品。我是国内首款交互式讲解类大模型，拥有国内最全游前攻略，我能把你们的资料信息讲给游客听。他们可以选择在对话框里打文字、发语音的方式来问我，也可以拍一张你们的照片上传来了解。
speaker: 博小翼
